title: Loudoun Convention & Visitors Association, Lodging, Loudoun County VA, 2006

features.amenities: Handicapped Access, Full Kitchen, Outdoor Pool
features.discript: Twelve fully equipped cottages overlooking the Potomac River at Algonkian Regional Park. Great for family vacations and retreats. The park features a nature trail, golf course, driving range, miniature golf, boat ramp, water playground, and picnic area.

features.amenities: High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Free Breakfast
features.discript: Escape to Pitzenpeeks Farm on the Eastern slope of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Enjoy peace and quiet on 425 acres with breathtaking views of the valley and mountains. Airy bedrooms with private baths are offered in a separate wing of this contemporary home which is furnished with antiques and works of art. Wide windows open to the breathtaking views. Savor complimentary freshly prepared gourmet breakfasts. Visit nearby steeplechases, fox hunts, scenic golf courses, hiking trails, canoe the Shenandoah; enjoy antique shops, wineries and fine restaurants.

features.hotel: Best Western Leesburg-Dulles Hotel & Conference Center
features.amenities: Suites, Handicapped Access, Outdoor Pool, Fitness Room, Free Breakfast, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Pet Friendly
features.discript: Centrally located in historic Leesburg, the Best Western Leesburg Hotel & Conference Center is a prime location for your out-of-town guests or any special affair. Our bountiful hot buffet breakfast is a wonderful start to your day and is complimentary. All of our well-appointed guest rooms are equipped with a coffee maker, microwave, refrigerator, hair dryer, iron and board, and in-room toiletries. Free high-speed Internet, swimming pool, 24-hour business center, and fitness center available. We love guests!

features.amenities: Handicapped Access,  Fitness Room, Free Breakfast, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Pet Friendly
features.discript: Conveniently located just two miles from Dulles International Airport, the hotel features 122 "Make it Hampton" signature guest rooms, each featuring high speed Internet access, irons and ironing boards, individual climate control, coffee makers, on-command pay-per-view movies, and complimentary HBO and local phone calls. We also offer a business center, fitness center, and wireless Internet access in the lobby.

features.amenities: Pet Friendly Suites, Outdoor Pool, Lounge, Free Breakfast, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: Historic farm (circa 1805) on 47 rolling acres with majestic mountain views. Stay in one of our antique-decorated rooms in the main house or in the cozy one bedroom cottage. Relax around our large pool or oversized hot tub. View the grazing horses. Learn about the Civil War battle that was fought here. Discover wineries, antique shops, hiking/biking/horseback riding trails, and fine restaurants in the area. Host your wedding, family celebration, business outing, or off-site retreat.

features.amenities: Suites Handicapped Access, Full Kitchen, Fitness Room, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Rental Car (on-site), Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Pet Friendly
features.discript: Candlewood Suites is brand new hotel with 121 suites and meeting space to accommodate up to twelve people. Each suite has a kitchen, workspace, free local calls, and free high speed Internet - wired/wireless. The property features an on-site convenience store, gazebo with two BBQ grills, free guest laundry, fitness room, and free CD/DVD library. Join our priority club rewards program and earn points for all your stays!

features.amenities: Whirlpool Suites Suites, Handicapped Access, Full Kitchen, Indoor Pool, Fitness Room, Free Breakfast, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Concierge Services, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: Not your typical mid range hotel! Designed with the comfort of business and leisure travelers in mind, we offer something for everyone. With a business center, meeting facilities, and wire (less) access work desk in all rooms, the Comfort Suites Leesburg is the perfect place to hold your next meeting. In town for leisure? Come take a dive in our indoor heated pool, grill with us in our outdoor pavilion, or take a ride in our shuttle.

features.amenities: Suites Full Kitchen, Free Breakfast, In-Room High Speed Internet Access
features.discript: This countryside property offers one private suite with a king bed, living/dining room, kitchen, mini-fridge, deck, washer/dryer, desk with high-speed Internet, Tivo, and DVD player/movies. Breakfast is served in-suite from a made-to-order menu. Have us stock your fridge for those late-night munchies, and/or surprise your loved one with rose petals sprinkled throughout your room, a bottle of wine, and some chocolates. Enjoy a massage during your stay, or participate in a woodworking or cooking class.

features.hotel: Country Inn & Suites, Washington Dulles Airport
features.amenities: Suites Handicapped Access, Fitness Room, Free Breakfast, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: Enjoy warm, friendly surroundings in the heart of the Dulles Technology Corridor. Just minutes from the airport, the Country Inn & Suites delivers first-class amenities amid the country charm that is the hallmark of our brand. We include a complimentary breakfast, airport shuttle, and high-speed Internet access in every room.

features.hotel: Courtyard by Marriott at Dulles Town Center
features.amenities: Whirlpool Suites Suites, Handicapped Access, Outdoor Pool, Indoor Pool, Fitness Room, Restaurant, Free Breakfast, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: This hotel features 157 spacious guest rooms and suites each with two phone lines, complimentary high speed internet connection, coffee makers, refrigerators, and movies. The hotel offers an indoor pool/whirlpool, business center, fitness center, The Market (food/snacks all day), Courtyard Café (breakfast buffet and made to order), and 1,200 sq. ft. of meeting space to accommodate 75. Adjacent to Dulles Town Center Mall and restaurants. Five miles from Dulles Airport. Complimentary airport shuttle from 6am-midnight.

features.amenities: Free Breakfast,  Pet Friendly
features.discript: Since 1773, visitors have experienced gracious hospitality at this Quaker brick/frame farmhouse in a secluded valley just outside the village of Lincoln. Over 25 acres of open fields with wildlife and farm animals, walking trails, a creek, and organic blueberry and raspberry fields. Enjoy our fireplaces, air conditioning, antiques, private baths, library with an extensive Civil War book collection, porches and decks, full breakfast, and afternoon tea. Special rates for long-term guests; children and pets welcome.

features.amenities: Handicapped Access,  Free Breakfast, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Pet Friendly
Pet Friendly,  Horse Boarding
features.discript: Historic 18th century farm in a pastoral setting, bordered by Goose Creek and thousands of acres of farmland and riding trails within the Middleburg Hunt. A perfect place to get away -- hike, fish, ride horses, watch or participate in a fox hunt, pick fruit and berries or go for a canoe ride on the creek. With all the necessities of life as well as the niceties, Eagle's Mount is also an ideal location for a retreat or family vacation. Three miles from downtown Middleburg, 40 miles from Washington, DC, and 24 miles from Dulles Airport. Children and pets are welcome.

features.amenities: Suites,  Handicapped Access, Outdoor Pool, Indoor Pool, Fitness Room, Room Service, Restaurant, Lounge, Free Breakfast, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: The Embassy Suites Hotel Dulles - North offers décor inspired by upscale, private airport clubs designed to meet the sophisticated demands of today's business traveler. As our guest you will enjoy a two-room suite, complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast daily, complimentary manager's reception daily, complimentary airport shuttle, complimentary high-speed and wireless Internet access in your suite, complimentary 24-hour access to two on-property fitness centers and business centers, and complimentary use of our indoor and outdoor swimming pools.

features.amenities: Handicapped Access Full KitchenIn-Room High Speed Internet AccessHigh Speed Internet Access On-SiteBusiness ServicesPet Friendly
features.discript: Extended StayAmerica is designed especially for longer stays, with studios featuring amenities you won't find in a typical hotel room, including fully-equipped kitchens, plenty of work space with computer dataport, free local phone calls, personalized voicemail, iron and full size ironing board, on-site guest laundry, dining and cooking utensils provided, and wireless high-speed Internet access (fees apply). Walking distance to restaurants and shopping.

features.amenities: Whirlpool Suites SuitesHandicapped AccessIndoor PoolFitness RoomRoom ServiceFree BreakfastShuttle to Shopping/AttractionsRental Car (on-site)Guest Laundry/Dry CleaningAirport ShuttleIn-Room High Speed Internet AccessHigh Speed Internet Access On-SiteBusiness Services
features.discript: We offer spacious rooms full of thoughtful amenities; deluxe complimentary continental breakfast; selected rooms with walk-in Jacuzzis; complimentary transportation to and from Dulles Airport, the Udvar-Hazy Center, and Dulles Town Center; "Park Here, Fly There" packages; on-site Enterprise Rent-A-Car; indoor pool and fitness center; wireless high speed Internet access; and room service.

features.amenities: Free Breakfast Pet Friendly
features.discript: Seeking a perfect getaway in the rural Virginia countryside? Enjoy horseback trail rides, fishing, and quiet walks through woodland paths. The house is a Civil War era stone home nestled on a 100-acre farm. Surrounded by a pond, woodlands and fields, the house offers shaded comfort, wide open spaces, and the finest in amenities and home country breakfasts! Your friendly hosts, Fran Wire and her family, are the eighth generation of family to own the property.

features.amenities: Whirlpool Suites,  Suites, Full Kitchen, Outdoor Pool, Lounge, Free Breakfast, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Horse Boarding
features.discript: The Goodstone Inn & Estate, a luxurious country retreat in Middleburg, Virginia, is situated in the heart of the state's renowned hunt & wine country, 45 minutes from Washington, DC. The historic property features five star-quality lodging in five distinctive dwellings, including 17 guestrooms and suites. Goodstone is part of a 265 acre estate that provides tranquility, privacy and panoramic country side views. The Goodstone Inn & Estate is a member of Small Luxury of the World.

features.amenities: Suites,  Handicapped Access, Indoor Pool, Fitness Room, Free Breakfast, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: 170 well-appointed guest rooms and suites located just 2 miles from Washington Dulles International Airport. Indoor pool, health club, high def tv and complimentary breakfast await you.

features.discript: Leesburg's newest hotel featuring rooms and suites with complimentary hot breakfast buffet, high speed Internet, indoor pool, on-site fitness center, access to Sport & Health Club, Airport transportation, and Hilton HHonors points and miles. Across from the Leesburg Corner Premium Outlets. On-site bus parking.

features.amenities: Whirlpool Suites,  Handicapped Access, Indoor Pool, Fitness Room, Free Breakfast, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: Conveniently located near Dulles International Airport and in the heart of Cascades Marketplace, with an abundance of restaurants, entertainment, and shopping. Features 152 deluxe rooms with high speed Internet access, microwaves and refrigerators, an indoor pool, outdoor whirlpool, fitness and business centers, meeting space, and a deluxe continental breakfast. Complimentary airport transportation.

features.hotel: Holiday Inn Leesburg at Historic Carradoc Hall
features.amenities: Suites Handicapped AccessOutdoor Pool, Fitness Room, Room Service, Restaurant, Lounge, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Pet Friendly
features.discript: An experience like no other Holiday Inn. The focal point of this 122 guestroom hotel is an 18th century mansion that houses four suites. There is a full service restaurant on the property.

features.amenities: Handicapped Access,  Indoor Pool, Fitness Room, Room Service, Restaurant, Lounge, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Concierge Services, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Pet Friendly
features.discript: Just 1.5 miles from Dulles Airport in the hi-tech Dulles corridor, featuring wired high speed Internet access in all guest rooms, wireless access in public areas, and wired access in meeting spaces. Only 10 minutes from the Udvar-Hazy Air and Space Museum and 15 miles from the Nation's Capitol. Full-service restaurant, sports pub, and recreation center.

features.amenities: Handicapped Access,  Full Kitchen, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Pet Friendly
features.discript: Homestead Studio Suite Hotels are specially designed to accommodate the business traveler relocating to the area, training or working on a temporary project. Features include personalized voice mail, free local calls and domestic faxes, laundry facility, full-size refrigerator, well-equipped kitchen with stovetop and microwave, and data port connections in every room. A room, a kitchen, a reasonable price. Weekly rates for Queen Studios from $59.99. Nightly rates from $85.99.

features.hotel: Homewood Suites by Hilton Dulles - North
features.amenities: Pet Friendly,  Suites, Handicapped Access, Full Kitchen, Outdoor Pool, Indoor Pool, Fitness Room, Room Service, Restaurant, Lounge, Free Breakfast, Rental Car (on-site), Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Concierge Services, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: Your "home away from home". This dynamic all suite hotel features full kitchens, separate living and bedroom areas, high speed Internet access and ample work space. Guests will enjoy the complimentary Suite Start hot breakfast served daily, as well as the Welcome Home Reception served Monday-Thursday featuring a light meal, beer, and wine. Airport shuttle service is provided. Whether you're traveling on business, relocating to the area or just planning a weekend trip, this hotel is a perfect fit.

features.amenities: Suites, Handicapped Access, Full Kitchen, Outdoor Pool, Fitness Room, Lounge, Free Breakfast, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: We are Hotel Sierra Washington Dulles and we're moving beyond the expected to the inspired. A unique fusion hotel with sophisticated lifestyle amenities, luxurious details and thoughtful complimentary services. We invite you to travel with a larger attitude.

features.hotel: Hyatt Place Sterling / Dulles Airport - North
features.amenities: Handicapped Access, Outdoor Pool, Fitness Room, Restaurant, Free Breakfast, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site
features.discript: Welcome to Hyatt Place! Conveniently located minutes from Dulles International Airport with complimentary airport shuttle and local transportation. Hyatt Place offers innovative design and the latest technology for today’s business and leisure traveler. Each guest room has separate living and sleeping areas and features the Hyatt Grand Bed, a 42" plasma HDTV, and free WiFi. Food and beverage available 24 hours. Special rates available for wedding guests and group events. Conference rooms up to 1600 sq ft.

features.amenities: Free Breakfast, Airport Shuttle, Pet Friendly, Horse Boarding
features.discript: Stunning, historic log house fully restored; private, warm, romantic.

features.amenities: Free Breakfast
Suites,  Free Breakfast, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Concierge Services, Airport Shuttle, Business Services Pet Friendly
features.discript: Our 165-year-old farmhouse is located in the historic village of Philomont at the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains. The surrounding area is abundant with horse farms, wineries, antique and upscale shops, biking and walking trails, and Civil War sites. The rooms are appointed in a traditional style and a large wrap-around front porch is perfect for sitting and relaxing and watching the world go by.

features.amenities: Suites,  Handicapped Access, Outdoor Pool, Indoor Pool, Fitness Room, Room Service, Restaurant Lounge, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Concierge ServicesAirport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: Lansdowne Resort is the capital region's premier full-service resort. Managed by Benchmark Hospitality International, the resort is set on over 500 acres of secluded countryside. Lansdowne features 305 newly renovated guestrooms and suites, a multi pool aquatic complex, 36 holes of championship golf including the new Greg Norman Design, a new 45,000 square foot clubhouse, the 12,000 square foot Spa Minérale, and six total dining outlets.
Colonial bed and breakfast with ten guest suites with fireplaces and whirlpool baths.

features.amenities: Suites, Free Breakfast
features.discript: Experience the charm of the Little River Inn located in historic Aldie. Built in the early 19th century, this lovely inn is furnished with unique antiques and paintings complementing that period. The Inn's central location in the Heart of Virginia Hunt Country allows guests to enjoy many nearby attractions including historic Oatlands Plantation, the town of Middleburg, garden and stable tour events, seasonal horse racing, antiques galore, and great restaurants. Providing overnight accommodations, full breakfast, and meeting facilities since 1982.
Management office open 8am-10pm Mon-Fri, and 8am-11pm Sat-Sun.

features.amenities: Free Breakfast
features.discript: Over 100-year-old renovated barn is set amid beautiful woods and Old World style gardens. Three spacious bedrooms with private baths, elegant Italian country ambiance, an art collection, antiques, a large library, and fireplaces add to our guests' comfort. Delicious breakfasts and European breads are our specialty. Ideal for small weddings and receptions.

features.amenities: Free Breakfast
features.discript: Lovettsville Bed & Breakfast is located in the northernmost town of Loudoun County. The 100+ year old farm house has been renovated and enlarged. Guests will enjoy comfortable bedrooms with private baths and fireplaces, a balcony/deck area, beautiful landscaping, and rural country views. Fresh flowers and breakfast/pastries prepared by the owners are just a few of the things to look forward to at Lovettsville B&B.

features.amenities: Outdoor Pool
features.discript: Meadowkirk provides retreat space for overnight and day use, including food service for adult and youth groups in a quiet and pastoral setting. We also have low and high ropes challenge courses for those groups looking to do some extra group building work. A summer camp program that is open to anyone from rising second grade through rising seniors in high school.

Meadowkirk provides retreat space for overnight and day use, including food service for adult and youth groups in a quiet and pastoral setting. These retreats can be hosted in a Georgian House built in 1907 all with private bathrooms. We also have low and high ropes challenge courses for those groups looking to do some extra group building work. Meadowkirk also has a summer camp program that is open to anyone from rising second grade through rising seniors in high school. Programs like cabin camp, equestrian camp & high adventure camp.

features.amenities: High Speed Internet Access, On-Site Outdoor Pool, Fitness Room, Free Breakfast, In-Room High Speed Internet Access
features.discript: Bob and Vicki Moore welcome you to enjoy a relaxing, refreshing, and renewing weekend at Middle Grove Inn in the tiny town of Philomont, located 15 miles west of Leesburg, 6 miles south of Purcellville, and 6 miles north of Middleburg in beautiful Virginia horse and hunt country. We're approximately 50 miles west of Washington DC but a world away from traffic, noise, and worry.

features.amenities: Whirlpool Suites, Suites, Room Service Restaurant, Lounge, Free Breakfast, Concierge Services, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: Located inside beautiful downtown Middleburg, the historic Middleburg Country Inn captures the true atmosphere and elegance of the region with eight sumptuously appointed rooms, each with king-size canopy bed and private bath. Your stay includes a rich country-style breakfast cooked to order, complimentary ice-cream, and homemade chocolate chip cookies.

features.amenities: Outdoor Pool, Free Breakfast, High Speed Internet Access On-Site
features.discript: This charming brick and stone manor house built by Quaker settlers in 1790 is the perfect setting for a quiet retreat or visiting local historical sites, gardens, vineyards, antique shops, the W&OD hiking and biking trail, and special events. We have 3 rooms with private or shared baths, cribs, an outdoor pool, a pond and a small boat for fishing, and a lounge/living room with a piano. Let us pick you up from the W&OD trail!

features.amenities: Suites, Outdoor Pool, Fitness Room, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Restaurant, Lounge, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Rental Car (on-site), Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Concierge Services, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access
features.discript: The National Conference Center offers 110 acres of natural, wooded surroundings teaming with deer and other wildlife. The tranquil, distraction-free environment encourages participation in activities that foster interaction and team building. Guests will enjoy the Virginia countryside and its convenience to golf courses, shopping, airports and the nation's capital. The National Conference Center offers 917 newly renovated private guest rooms and 250 meeting rooms to accommodate conferences from 4-900 people. Advanced reservations required; groups only.

features.amenities: Free Breakfast, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site
features.discript: The Norris House Inn is a landmark in the historic district of Leesburg offering upscale accommodations amidst elegant surroundings in a garden oasis. The six bedroom Inn provides Wi/Fi and DSL Internet access, private bathrooms, gourmet breakfasts, sitting rooms, meeting space, and a relaxing veranda. Within walking distance of fine restaurants and shops, it is the ideal choice for corporate clients, business travelers, cyclists and hikers, wedding guests, family reunion members, and couples seeking a romantic getaway.

features.amenities: Outdoor Pool, Free Breakfast, High Speed Internet Access On-Site
features.discript: This 18th century log, stone, and brick farmhouse is situated on 200 acres down a quiet dirt road. A Virginia historic landmark, this small working farm is home to its ninth generation owners as well as twenty Angus cattle, two horses, two dogs, several cats, and assorted wildlife. The house is surrounded by century-old evergreens and a meandering perennial garden. There are four bedrooms, each with a private sitting room with a working fireplace. Special weekly or long-term rates available.

features.amenities: Free Breakfast
features.discript: Poor House Farm is located between Middleburg and Purcellville, in the heart of hunt country. The farm features a restored 1814 plantation home featuring a lovely porch and fireplaces. We offer four rooms total with a beautiful cottage. Surrounded by fields used for foxhunting and walking. Events and activities abound, including antiquing, vineyards, history reenactments, shopping, and equestrian events.

features.amenities: Suites, Handicapped Access, Fitness Room, Free Breakfast, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: The newly renovated Quality Inn & Suites is set amid the rolling countryside of Northern Virginia, 1 mile from Dulles Airport and 4 miles from historic battlefields. Guests can choose from rooms with 1-2 queen beds or suites with refrigerators, microwaves, and extra living space. A complimentary continental breakfast is offered each morning, and free coffee and tea are available throughout the day. This hotel is a great choice for both business and leisure travelers visiting this historic, vibrant and exciting region.

features.amenities: Restaurant
features.discript: Since 1728 this romantic Country Inn has provided guests with good food, romantic accommodations, and efficient service. All twenty three rooms are tastefully furnished with four-poster beds and offer updated amenities including air-conditioning, private baths, direct dial telephones with individual voicemail, and cable television. Enjoy the extras, including fresh flowers, thick cotton bathrobes, bedside sweets, and the morning Washington paper. The Inn offers a full service restaurant with Continental cuisine and can also accommodate social events and corporate meetings.

features.amenities: Suites, Handicapped Access, Full Kitchen, Indoor Pool, Free Breakfast, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Pet Friendly
features.discript: All suite hotel with modern day conveniences, including fully equipped kitchens and separate sleeping and living areas. The Residence Inn has three room types for you to chose from: studio suite, 1 bedroom suite, and 2 bedroom suite. All suites include 32" HD LCD TVs and select suites have fireplaces. 800 square feet of meeeting space. Guest amenities include indoor pool, billiards room, 9 hole putting green, 24-hour market, complimentary hot breakfast, and high speed Internet.

features.amenities: Free Breakfast, Horse Boarding
features.discript: Victorian country estate set at the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains and in the historic village of Bluemont. Two newly refurbished bedrooms with private baths and a studio cottage offer a delightful "stay in the country". The décor is based on the traditions of the innkeepers' European family history. A 22-stall barn and indoor/outdoor arena set on 40 rolling acres will please horses and horse lovers alike. Riding lessons, trail rides, and summer pony camps for children are offered.

features.amenities: Handicapped Access, Free Breakfast
features.discript: 18th century stone home, antiques, gardens. Vista of rolling countryside.

features.amenities: Suites,  Handicapped Access, Indoor Pool, Fitness Room, Free Breakfast, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Pet Friendly
features.discript: The SpringHill Suites features a smartly designed separation of space to satisfy a variety of guest needs. The spacious suites, approximately 25% larger than a traditional room, feature areas for rest, relaxation, enjoyment, and productivity. The SpringHill Suites by Marriott Dulles Airport provides complimentary hot breakfast daily, complimentary wireless high speed Internet access, and 32” flat screen HDTVs in every suite. Located conveniently near Washington Dulles International Airport, the SpringHill Suites provides fine accommodation for business and leisure travelers.

features.hotel: Stone Manor Vineyard and Orchard Bed & Breakfast
features.amenities: Whirlpool,  Suites Suites, Free Breakfast, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: Stone Manor, surrounded by five vineyards, boasts one of the finest biking roads in the country, luxurious and romantic suites, artesian spa products, and beautiful gardens. Stone Manor is known for its splendid collection of stained glass windows, opulent furnishings, and old world architecture. The Manor’s breakfasts boast homegrown and homemade jams, jellies, and fresh eggs from our free-range hens. The rooms are richly appointed with two person, 10 spray showers, and deep Jacuzzi tubs.

features.amenities: Handicapped Access Full Kitchen, Fitness Room, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Pet Friendly
features.discript: Your home away from home! We offer 132 guest rooms with complete in-room kitchens, convenient on-site laundry, voicemail, free high speed and wireless Internet access, and free local calls as well as meeting space for gatherings or meetings. At Suburban, we provide just what you need for a great extended stay - without putting a big dent in you budget! We are 23 miles from Washington DC and five miles from Dulles Airport. Transportation is available.

features.amenities: Full Kitchen Outdoor Pool, Fitness Room, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Pet Friendly
features.discript: Extended stay hotel 6 miles from Washington Dulles Int'l Airport. We offer studio and one and two-bedroom suites with new upgraded mattresses, fully equipped kitchens, 2 phone lines, voicemail, free wireless high-speed Internet access, and iron and ironing boards. Housekeeping included based on length of stay. Enjoy our exercise room, relax in our outdoor pool, or make a delicious meal on an outdoor grill. Walk to Cascades Marketplace, an outdoor shopping area with many restaurants and conveniences. Marriott Rewards points.

features.hotel: TownePlace Suites by Marriott Washington Dulles Airport
features.amenities: Suites Handicapped Access, Full Kitchen, Outdoor Pool, Fitness Room, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services, Pet Friendly
features.discript: All-suite hotel with complimentary high speed Internet, full kitchens, individual climate control, coffee makers, irons and ironing boards, two-line phones with dataport and voicemail, on-command pay-per-view movies, cable channels with HBO, Sony PlayStations, work areas, separate living and sleeping areas, and interior corridor rooms. Outdoor pool and grill, guest laundry, business center, and cardio/fitness center. Pet-friendly.

features.amenities: Suites, Handicapped Access, Outdoor Pool, Indoor Pool, Fitness Room, Room Service, Restaurant, Lounge, Shuttle to Shopping/Attractions, Guest Laundry/Dry Cleaning, Concierge Services, Airport Shuttle, In-Room High Speed Internet Access, High Speed Internet Access On-Site, Business Services
features.discript: The charming 368-room Dulles Airport Marriott offers guests a completely smoke-free environment in the heart of the Dulles Technology Corridor adjacent to Washington Dulles International Airport, one mile from the National Air and Space Museum, and 25 miles from downtown Washington, DC. In addition to featuring comfortable accommodations and hallmark Marriott service, our picturesque grounds offer two sand volleyball courts, a full basketball court, two lighted tennis courts, full softball field, and a covered picnic pavilion.
Open April-December.

name: Loudoun Convention & Visitors Association, Lodging, Loudoun County VA, 2006
description: This dataset provides a listing of hotels and other accommodations in and around Leesburg VA. It does not necessarily include all accommodations in the area. Points provide information such as a website and description as well as the amenities. All description and other information are from the Visit Loudoun Website.
